summary: Defines a collection of Pydantic data models that encapsulate configuration parameters for various image‑processing tasks (e.g., CellVoyager conversion, illumination correction, maximum intensity projection, registration, registration consensus, multiplexed acquisition) and for describing inputs and outputs of napari workflows.
business_intent: Standardize and validate task‑specific arguments and metadata, enabling reliable orchestration of microscopy image analysis pipelines within the Fractal framework.
